body_content.explanation: effectively organized so that all the parts work well together:
examples: The rebel troops have launched a coordinated attack on government soldiers.
He described the evacuation as one of the most successful and well co-ordinated he had seen.

body_content.explanation: If a person is coordinated, they move in a very easy and controlled way, especially when playing sports or dancing:
examples: I wasn't a very coordinated child.

body_content.explanation: arranged so that the colours, etc. match or look attractive together:
examples: The colour scheme of their living room is carefully coordinated.
